name: Nonies Party
description: Nonies Party is a local multiplayer game developed by HidBox Games where players control cute, lovable Nonies representing two teams. The objective is to race and grab a ball placed at the north end of the map, bring it back to their bases located in the south part of the map, and score as many points as possible within a predetermined amount of time. The game is fast-paced, action-packed, and features obstacles, jumps, and rival-hitting to get ahead. It's easy to pick up and perfect for both casual and competitive players. With colorful graphics and upbeat music, Nonies Party creates a festive and fun atmosphere that players of all ages can enjoy.
